name: lkwdwrd/wp-muplugin-loader
description: A drop-in MU Plugin loader for WordPress

scripts.export-coverage: test-reporter --stdout > codeclimate.json && curl -X POST -d @codeclimate.json -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'User-Agent: Code Climate (PHP Test Reporter v0.1.1)' https://codeclimate.com/test_reports
